climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Easy Care: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, with like colors. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. lron on lowest setting as needed. Do not dry clean.

Baby Nursery Bedding Crib Set Includes: Cartoon comforter, baby crib bed sheet, bed skirt and plush toy. This soft baby bedding set with cartoon elements such as unicorn, dinosaur, giraffe and planet is a favorite for babies. 4 pcs crib sets are in colorful will blend in well with the warm atmosphere of the baby room.

Cartoon Comforter: The multi-functional quilt with cartoon elements features a large-scale print that allows for a multitude of uses in and out your baby’s nursery. Size in 35x45 inch that fits standard size crib well. It is also reversible with the alternative side matching the dust ruffle design. Bringing a perfectly calm and soothing feeling to your little girl or boy's nursery.

Soft Crib Sheet: The fitted crib sheet has the perfect universal fit, designed 28 in x 52 in with 8 inch deep pockets for a standard crib mattress with snug fitting all around elastic and is crafted from the same soft and stylish cartoon print. 4 fitted split corners make changing and washing more easier. Cozy enough for daily baby care.

Elegent Crib Skirt: 4 sided crib skirt, with a tonal warmth design and has a generous 14 inch drop and fits a standard crib mattress of 51 by 27 inches, comfortable and breathable. Coordinate this set with our comforter and crib fitted sheets to complete your baby bedroom. Let your baby's bedroom look more elegant and generous.

Perfect Gift: Each set comes with a themed plush toy. This 4-pack baby crib comforter bedding set creates a comforting and calming sleep environment to help kids get the rest they need. One buy to get all you needs for a standard crib. It makes the perfect gift for you and your future baby! Also perfect for a baby shower or any nursery occasion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don't know why some reviews said the colors aren't bright like the picture but IT Is! So in live with the colors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars On the thinner side
reviews.reviewText: This solar system bedding set is adorable! The material is nice & soft, but very thin. I love that the comforter, bed skirt, & fitted sheet have nice, bright colors & the sun plushie was a perfect addition. I washed everything before adding it to crib without anything shrinking. Fitted sheet does have elastic all the way around to stay in place which is nice since our little guy likes to roll around & jump. This will work better for him the the warmer months than right now when it's freezing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4 Piece Crib Bedding Set Review - A Perfect Blend of Comfort and Style
reviews.reviewText: 🦒 Adorable Design:The Bertte 4 Piece Crib Bedding Set is a delightful addition to any nursery, featuring an enchanting Pink Giraffe theme. The cartoon quilt, crib skirt, fitted crib sheet, and plush toy come together seamlessly to create an adorable and cohesive look. The Pink Giraffe design adds a touch of charm and playfulness, making it an ideal choice for both boys and girls.👶 Soft and Comfortable Materials:Crafted with the comfort of your little one in mind, this crib bedding set is made from soft and gentle materials. The quilt provides just the right amount of warmth, while the fitted crib sheet ensures a cozy and snug fit on the mattress. The plush toy is an adorable addition, offering a soft companion for your baby.🌈 Complete Nursery Bedding Set:This set stands out for its completeness, providing all the essential pieces for a well-coordinated nursery. The inclusion of a cartoon quilt, crib skirt, fitted crib sheet, and a plush toy ensures that every aspect of your baby's crib is covered. The standard size of the bedding set makes it versatile and suitable for most cribs.🎨 Versatile Pink Giraffe Theme:The Pink Giraffe theme adds a playful and gender-neutral touch to the nursery. Whether you have a little boy or girl, the design is versatile and charming. The color palette is soothing and inviting, creating a serene atmosphere in the baby's room.🛏️ Easy to Care for:Practicality is key for parents, and the Bertte crib bedding set doesn't disappoint. The materials are easy to care for, allowing for convenient cleaning and maintenance. This is a significant advantage for busy parents who want bedding that can withstand the inevitable messes and spills.Conclusion:The Bertte 4 Piece Crib Bedding Set in Pink Giraffe is a charming and well-crafted choice for creating a cozy and visually appealing nursery. From the softness of the materials to the completeness of the set, it ticks all the boxes for parents seeking both style and comfort for their little ones. Transform your baby's crib into a haven of cuteness with this delightful bedding set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my son. I love how vibrant the colors are as well as the quality of everything. Love the little stuffed animal it came with as well. This looks great in my son's crib and he loves snuggling with the stuffed dinosaur.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 4 Piece Crib Bedding Set for Boys
reviews.reviewText: 4 Piece Crib Bedding Set for Boys - came as described. We used it as bedding for a toddler bed instead of a crib and it fit well. No issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful crib set, it’s very colorful and match my nursery perfectly. The fitted sheet is thin and breathable, and work best for warm temperature days to keep my baby cool, it fits the crib perfectly. It’s giftable, the plushy is a nice touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my daughter’s nursery and I really love it! The colors are just as pictured and come with everything in the photo as well as the little giraffe. Really great for a pink or neutral color nursery. The quilt is also a very thick material that is easy to wash and keeps its shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This review is for the “Bertte 4 Piece Standard Size Soft Baby Bedding Crib Set Including Pink Giraffe Plush Toy” The best thing about this set is the pink giraffe. It is well made with embroidered spots and adorable. The Blanket is patterned on the back to match the fitted sheet and the crib skirt is a neutral pink design that would go with most any girly bedding. Fabric on everything is polyester and thin. The part of the bed skirt that lays hidden is made of nonwoven paper-like fabric. The fitted sheet has elastic all the way around. I washed the blanket and sheet according to the instructions and it came out of the dryer looking brand new.
